html:
In the lecture hall of the National University of the Peruvian Amazon, on Tuesday, December 21, the closing of the first stage of the Emprende Loretana ?Wayna Yupuni? project of the Development Management took place Social of the Regional Government of Loreto, where liberated from the Free Middle Establishment of the North East region, they completed their training after ten months of preparation.

Two were released who received certification from the hands of the Regional Governor of Loreto, Elisban Ochoa Sosa, who accredits their training in electronics (cell phone repair), receiving parallel to technical issues, courses on self-esteem, leadership, path to equality, strengthening of skills, psychological and legal support, as well as permanent counseling.

It should be noted that the project is aimed at women in a state of vulnerability, its main objective being to promote their own income, entrepreneurship, business management, business plan, among others.

Percy Adriel Romero C?ceres, head of the Middle Free Establishment in the North East region thanked the regional government for such an important management and congratulated the two EML entrepreneurs for their interest and example of dedication and improvement. INPE welcomes all collaboration of public and private entities that contribute to the advancement of the treatment process of people who are inside and outside the walls.
